channel.title: Linux on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on TLDRBins

item.title: Cron Jobs
item.description: Linux Check Cron Jobs ls -la /etc/cron.d/ cat /etc/crontab crontab -l Check Background Processes ./pspy64 Ref: pspy64

item.title: Find
item.description: Linux Locate a File locate <FILE> Files of Type 'File' find . -type f Find and Open find / -name <FILE> -exec cat {} \; SetUID and SetGID Files find / -type f -user root \( -perm -4000 -o -perm -2000 \) 2>/dev/null -ls Files Owned by User find / -user <USER> -ls 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e " \/proc" -e " \/sys" Files Owned by Group find / -group <GROUP> 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e ^/proc -e ^/sys World Writable Files and Directories (Exclude Sticky Bit) find / -type f,d \( -perm -0002 -a !

item.title: Firewall (Linux)
item.description: Linux Check Firewall Rules # Show all rules sudo iptables -L -v -n --line-numbers # Show target chain sudo iptables -L <CHAIN> -v -n --line-numbers sudo iptables -L INPUT -v -n --line-numbers Set Firewall Rules # Default policy sudo iptables -P <CHAIN> <RULE> sudo iptables -P INPUT DROP sudo iptables -A <CHAIN> -p <PROTOCOL> -s <SOURCE> --dport <PORT> -j <RULE> # Allow SSH from a specific subnet sudo iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -s 192.

item.title: IP Routing
item.description: Linux Windows Check Routes ip route show Add Route sudo ip route add <SUBNET> via <GATEWAY> dev <INTERFACE> sudo ip route add 172.16.0.0/16 via 192.168.1.10 dev eth0 Modify Route sudo ip route replace <SUBNET> via <GATEWAY> dev <INTERFACE> sudo ip route replace 172.16.0.0/16 via 192.168.1.20 dev eth0 Delete Route sudo ip route del <SUBNET> sudo ip route del 172.16.0.0/16 # Exact match sudo ip route del <SUBNET> via <GATEWAY> dev <INTERFACE> sudo ip route del 172.

item.title: Samba
item.description: Priesc #1: Retrieve NTLM from Samba Backup ldbsearch 1. Query 'unicodepwd' of Target User ldbsearch -H sam.ldb '(samaccountname=<USER>)' 'unicodepwd' $ ldbsearch -H sam.ldb '(samaccountname=Administrator)' 'unicodepwd' # record 1 dn: CN=Administrator,CN=Users,DC=example,DC=com unicodePwd:: iEb36u6PsRetBr3YMLdYbA== # Referral ref: ldap:///CN=Configuration,DC=example,DC=com # Referral ref: ldap:///DC=DomainDnsZones,DC=example,DC=com # Referral ref: ldap:///DC=ForestDnsZones,DC=example,DC=com # returned 4 records # 1 entries # 3 referrals 2. Convert to Hex echo -n '<UNICODEPWD>' | base64 -d | xxd -p $ echo -n 'iEb36u6PsRetBr3YMLdYbA==' | base64 -d | xxd -p 8846f7eaee8fb117ad06bdd830b7586c 3.
